snippet: The police in Millstone, N.J., said they discovered the weapons in 2014 at the house of John Lafergola, who on Tuesday was ordered held without bail.
lead_paragraph: The police in Millstone, N.J., said they discovered the weapons in 2014 at the house of John Lafergola, who on Tuesday was ordered held without bail.

headline.main: New Jersey Man Accused of Possessing 36 Illegal Machine Guns Is Arraigned
